definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Two masked men held up a mail van.
sentences.chinese: 兩個戴面具的人攔路搶劫了一輛郵車。

sentences.english: The mail reached London at the dreary hour of five.
sentences.chinese: 郵車到達倫敦是在天已昏暗的五點鐘。

sentences.english: Only a few posting-chaises were setting out at a gallop from the Hotel des Princes and the Hotel Meurice.
sentences.chinese: 只有少數幾輛郵車從親王旅社和默里斯旅社奔馳出發。

sentences.english: Can I catch the last mail today?
sentences.chinese: 我能趕上今天最後一班的郵車嗎？

sentences.english: The mail-cart of a flying travel is on highway dash around madly.
sentences.chinese: 一輛飛速行駛的郵車在公路上橫衝直撞。

sentences.english: He takes a trip in the tight, smelly night mail-coach for Clavering.
sentences.chinese: 他乘一輛擁擠的，氣味熏天的夜班郵車去克拉弗林。

sentences.english: Mail comes to this remote village only once a week.
sentences.chinese: 郵車每週只到這個偏偏僻的村落一主。

sentences.english: Furthermore, this paper discusses the design and implementation of the remote monitoring system over Bluetooth.
sentences.chinese: 討論了基於藍牙技術的郵車調度系統的硬件實現。

sentences.english: The mail picked us up about dusk at the Royal George on the heath.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏時分，我們在“喬治王”前的荒地上搭乘了郵車。

sentences.english: The realization of hardware for post vehicle management information system based on bluetooth is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 討論了基於藍牙技術的郵車調度系統的硬件實現。

sentences.english: A mail van was parked beside my house when I got home.
sentences.chinese: 我回家的時候，一輛郵車停在我房子旁邊。
